name: permaweb-glossary-search
description: A lightweight client-side search for the Permaweb Glossary using FlexSearch

scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:copy && bun run build:minify && bun run build:post-process
scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p dist && cp -r public/* dist/ && mkdir -p dist/src && rsync -av --exclude='*.js' src/ dist/src/
scripts.build:minify: bun build src/js/main.js --outdir dist/src/js --minify && bun build src/css/style.css --outdir dist/src/css --minify && bun build src/js/keyboard-nav.js --outdir dist/src/js --minify && bun build src/js/service-worker.js --outdir dist/ --minify
